articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Participants of National Meeting Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Participants of National Meeting Visit Different Places
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They put flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, in Mangyongdae and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 Then they moved to the birthplace of the President. There they went round the historic relics, looking back on the revolutionary life of the President with deep emotion. 
					
					 They also visited the Korean Revolution Museum, the E-library and the Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University, the Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Wheat Flour-Processing Combine and enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus.

articles.title: Officials in Field of Land Management and Environment and Relevant Fields Meet
articles.content:
Officials in Field of Land Management and Environment and Relevant Fields Meet
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Officials in the field of the protection of land and environment and relevant fields met at the People's Palace of Culture Friday.
					 Attending it were Choe Yong Rim, Jon Pyong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok, officials of working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and party and power organs in the provinces, cities and counties and those in the field of the protection of land and environment and relevant fields.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes and experience gained in land management last year. It discussed the issue of making bigger successes this year, the 15th anniversary of the start of the general mobilization for land management.
					
					 Vice-premier Jon Ha Chol made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the many changes that took place in the general mobilization for land management last year under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Officials and workers in the forestry field turned a national tree nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation into a big saplings production center and stepped up the building of tree nurseries in various provinces. They also put the production of tree saplings on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis, opening up a bright prospect for turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 Hundreds of kilometers of roads were paved and many bridges built and successful progress was made in the improvement of rivers and streams. A great many new dwelling houses were built and progress was made in the preservation of historic sites, scenic spots and national treasures.
					
					 Officials and workers of all the provinces worked hard to turn their residential areas into socialist cities and villages of bliss.
					
					They called for dynamically waging the work to radically change the appearance of the country in all fields and at all units and thus make a contribution to improving the standard of people's living and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: National Symposium on Koryo Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Koryo Medical Science Held
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on Koryo medical science took place in Pyongyang from Feb. 23 to 25 to mark the 50th anniversary of the founding of the Academy of Koryo Medical Science. 
					 Present there were scientists, teachers and medical workers in the field of Koryo medical science.
					
					 It heard a lot of papers dealing with the successes and experience gained in the researches to put the Koryo medical science on a new scientific and technological basis and the curative and preventive medical care.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were the papers which reflected the effective methods of treating patients by acupuncture and moxibustion as they helped settle the problems arising in properly combining the Koryo medical science with modern medicine and treating incurable diseases by Koryo medicines.
					
					 The participants appreciated the papers introducing the successes made in making scientific clarification of the theories concerning experience, in particular, and in conducting the researches into putting Koryo medicines on an extractive and standardization basis.

articles.title: Great National Unity Called for
articles.content:
Great National Unity Called for
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The great unity of nation serves as a sure guarantee for national reunification, say major newspapers of the DPRK Friday in their by-lined articles. 
					 In order to achieve the reunification of the country all Koreans should firmly unite under the banner of patriotism, notes Rodong Sinmun. It goes on:
					
					 The cause of national reunification is the one to rejoin the severed blood ties of the nation and help the Koreans reappear as a reunified nation.
					
					 It is possible to achieve the historical cause of national reunification only when all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas go united close as one, transcending the differences caused by the territorial division. 
					
					 What is the most important for achieving the great national unity is to adhere to a correct principle for achieving the unity. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea advanced a line and policies on achieving firm unity with all Koreans, political parties and organizations that have the spirit of national independence and patriotic will in order to realize national reunification. They have displayed their great vitality. 
					
					 The WPK's idea and line for the great national unity are based on the idea that neither class nor stratum can be above the nation and an individual can be independent only when national independence is attained. 
					
					 Any Korean who loves the country and the nation should unite close under the banner of patriotism irrespective of ideology, ism, political view, religion, class and stratum. This is the fundamental spirit of the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The reality in the June 15 era of reunification eloquently proves that it is possible to frustrate all challenges and obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces and win the victory in the cause of national reunification only when the Koreans advance under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself", the idea of the great national unity. 
					
					 Minju Joson notes that the DPRK's principled and firm stand is commanding the full support of the fellow countrymen as it reflects their will to frustrate the moves of the separatists against reunification through the great national unity and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country without fail.

articles.title: Capitalism Termed Unpopular Society
articles.content:
Capitalism Termed Unpopular Society
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Capitalism is the most reactionary and unpopular society as it harshly exploits and oppresses the toiling masses, regarding them as breathing tools and means for material production.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The bourgeoisie in the West regard human beings as no more than a means for material production and worthless beings able to work which can be traded as commodities.
					
					 The power in the capitalist society is not in the hands of the toiling masses who account for the overwhelming majority of the population but in those of a tiny handful of the privileged circles. 
					
					 The moneyless and poor in the capitalist society can never have any opportunity to become a managing official of the state no matter how able they are. 
					
					 The means of production in the capitalist society are in the hands of a tiny handful of capitalists, not in those of the toiling masses. They are used as means for bringing profits to the capitalists and tools for fleecing the people.
					
					 The bourgeoisie assert that the economic operation based on the private ownership of production means is the most effective managing method making it possible to enhance the producers' zeal for production and produce more goods per hour.
					
					 This is a reactionary doctrine aimed to reduce the toiling masses to de facto commodities and impose upon them the fate of being tools for material production.
					
					 The capitalists are further intensifying the exploitation of the workers with intelligence in the field of IT development by boosting their labor intensity.
					
					 They are utterly indifferent to the labor conditions and health of the workers.
					
					 They fire those workers without mercy when they get disabled and sick while on the job.
					
					 The life of the people in the capitalist countries is getting harder as various kinds of taxes are on the steady increase whereas the expenses for social measures are dwindling. 
					
					 The toiling masses in the capitalist society are denied treatment as human beings and cannot enjoy a worthwhile life, much less holding their due status. It is only in the socialist society where the people can lead a genuine life as they are considered as the most valuable beings.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Awarded Honorary Title of Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Awarded Honorary Title of Ecuador
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received honorary title "Great Defender" from the Loja City Government of Loja Province of Ecuador on the occasion of his birthday.
					 A ceremony for conveying a certificate of the title took place at the building of the Loja City Government.
					
					 The certificate was handed to an official concerned of the DPRK active in this country.

articles.title: DPRK Circus Stuns World Spectators
articles.content:
DPRK Circus Stuns World Spectators
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK's circus numbers are winning high acclaims of experts and spectators at international circus festivals.   
					 Acrobatics "Fliers" won the prize of the French president, the top prize of the recent 19th Massy International Circus Festival held in France.
					
					 This number also grabbed golden prizes at the 12th Latina International Circus Festival and the 9th Grenoble International Circus Festival. 
					
					 Other circus numbers including "Aerial Trapeze" and "Trapeze Flight on Horizontal Bar" were also highly acclaimed by spectators at the 26th "Golden Circus" International Circus Festival and the 9th Wuhan International Circus Festival. 
					
					 A golden prize went to the aerial stunt "Three-stage Trapeze Flight" at the 33rd Monte Carlo International Circus Festival and a golden lion prize to "Flying on Double Swing" and "Balancing Etude" in the 12th Wuqiao International Acrobatic Festival.
					
					 Other circus numbers including "Multilateral Flight" and "Board and Swing" mesmerized the spectators at world famous circus festivals, a striking demonstration of the DPRK's daily developing Juche-oriented acrobatic art.

articles.title: Reverence for Kim Jong Il Expressed at Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Reverence for Kim Jong Il Expressed at Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans expressed their deep reverence for leader Kim Jong Il after visiting the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival.
					 Meng Jianzhu, state councilor and minister of Public Security of China, said: Peculiar is that the Chinese embassy in the DPRK hung at its display stand a picture of General Secretary Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il meeting with each other. Immortal Kimjongilia won gold prize, the top prize, at the World Horticultural Expo held in China.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, said: This annual festival for celebrating Kim Jong Il's birthday is an eruption of Korean people's boundless reverence for him. The flowers named after the leader, a great man, have come to full bloom, and I will work hard to propagate Kimjongilia in my country.
					
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, said that the immortal flowers made him feel how deep the Korean people's trust in their leader is.
					
					 Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), said that the festival was of weighty significance as it well showed people's deep reverence for the great man.
					
					 Ri Myong Yu, chairman of the Shizuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, expressed the will to keep pace with the people in the homeland dynamically advancing toward future under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Popular Pyongyang Liquor and Pyongyang Gin
articles.content:
Popular Pyongyang Liquor and Pyongyang Gin
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang liquor and Pyongyang gin produced at the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory are very popular among customers. 
					 They are not only very tasty but they look attractive and peculiar ranging from their transparent bottles to nice brands.
					
					 They are mild and fragrant. Their alcoholic contents are 30 percent, 40 percent and 25 percent respectively.
					
					  The liquor and gin also go with the turtle dishes served at the famous Specialist Restaurant under Okryu Restaurant.
					
					 Ri Song Min, 77, residing in Central District, Pyongyang, said when interviewed by KCNA: "I feel rare turtle dishes tastier, indeed, as I drink this good liquor."

articles.title: Ionic Reaction Curative Apparatus Developed
articles.content:
Ionic Reaction Curative Apparatus Developed
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- An ionic reaction curative apparatus is now in use in the DPRK.
					 This apparatus helps adjust the change of bioelectricity in a human body to let active substance penetrate into organism. This process not only changes the symptoms of inflammation and others and brings them to normalcy but remarkably increases the organism's resistance against diseases.
					
					 The apparatus consists of a positive ion exchanger, doubling rod, 
					
					dynamotor, outer cover, connector and adapter.
					
					 Its electricity consumption is 12W and it weighs about 50g.
					
					 It is good for treating inflammation and other diseases. It does not cause any complication or any adverse aftereffect. Its application is simple and can expect quick efficacy.
					
					 The effective ratio for the treatment of chronic bronchitis is 87.7% and that for the treatment of acute pneumonia 88.9%.

articles.title: Ryongchon Mineral Water
articles.content:
Ryongchon Mineral Water 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Cozy spring water houses nestling at the foot of Mt. Kyongam in the western part of the DPRK serve tasty and germ-free spring water.
					 Those who cooked rice, soup and dishes with this water cured their stomach trouble and their number is on the steady increase.
					
					 This water was called the Ryongchon mineral water in the olden days.
					
					 Not only villagers but passers-by drank this water.
					
					 Later the spring changed its course, leaving the spa deserted and only children used to catch salamanders there. The spa finally disappeared.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who always orientated his thinking and practice to the people's happiness, took notice of a line reading that Rim Kkyok Jong cured his stomach trouble with Ryongchon mineral water. He made sure that this water was found.
					
					 The mineral water on Mt. Kyongam was finally confirmed to be the Ryongchon mineral water.

articles.title: Philologist Who Contributed to Development of Korean Language
articles.content:
Philologist Who Contributed to Development of Korean Language
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Ju Si Gyong (1876-1914), is one of the patriotic philologists who devoted all his life to the study of Korean language.
					 He learnt Chinese characters and Korean philology from the age of 14.
					
					 He worked as a Korean language lecturer at different educational institutions. He played a pivotal role as a member of the "Korean Language Institute" at the educational institution of the Federal Government of Ri Dynasty.
					
					 After the Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", he organized the Korean Language Training Course and the Korean Literature Institute, instilling the anti-Japanese patriotic idea into people and working hard to teach them Korean language.
					
					 He authored a series of works including "Language", "Korean Grammar and Phonetics," "Korean Grammar" and "Phonetics" conducive to laying a foundation of philology in the modern times.
					
					 He, in his works, tried hard to use Korean letters as many as possible instead of Chinese characters and studied writing regulations for the purpose of setting right the confused orthography.
					
					 Characteristic of his linguistic study and activities was that he founded modern language theory and widely expanded the Korean language study and the movement for learning the language in various aspects.

articles.title: Mexican Party Congress Hails Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Mexican Party Congress Hails Korean People's Struggle
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The 8th Congress of the Communist Party of Mexico took place in Mexico City on Feb. 19.
					 Before the opening of the congress, copies of Unidad Nacional, organ of the Party, which carried special write-ups under the title of "Leader of the Workers' Party of Korea" to celebrate leader Kim Jong Il's birthday, were distributed to all its participants.  
					
					 A congratulatory message from the WPK Central Committee was read out at the congress after congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The congress adopted a statement supporting the WPK and the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 Under the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK and the Korean people are working hard for the building of a thriving nation and independent reunification of the country, smashing with the might of Songun the offensive of the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces to stifle the DPRK, the statement said.
					
					 It expressed solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in the efforts to adorn this year as a significant year of bringing about a new phase for independent reunification under the banner of the inter-Korean declarations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Japanese
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Japanesea
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Masaharu Ueki, secretary general of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism, expressed boundless reverence for leader Kim Jong Il while staying in the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					I was deeply impressed to visit the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival during my visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 It presented fantastic scenery as it was full of beautiful flowers that came into full bloom thanks to the best wishes of the Korean people and the world progressives for General Secretary Kim Jong Il. Kimjongilia is the flower praising the great man. 
					
					 My visit to the venue provided an opportunity to realize what profound trust the Korean people and the world progressives repose in Kim Jong Il. 
					
					I was greatly inspired to witness the dynamic drive being waged by the Korean people for the prosperity of the country under his leadership. 
					
					 I pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il, the brilliant thinker and theoretician and peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun. 
					
					 We will conduct in the future, too, brisk activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea giving most correct answers to the questions arising in the anti-imperialist struggle and the efforts to accomplish global independence.

articles.title: Iraqi Exile Confirms Fabrication for Iraqi War
articles.content:
Iraqi Exile Confirms Fabrication for Iraqi War
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- It was revealed recently that an Iraqi exile admitted his fabrication for the Iraqi war.
					 According to the Japanese Asahi Shimbun on Feb. 20, he made false information about Iraq's suspected development of weapons of mass destruction in the hope of toppling the Saddam government. It was taken by the U.S. as a reason for the war.
					
					 He reportedly went to Germany as an exile in March 2000 and soon accepted a request for cooperation from a German spy chief.
					
					 Regarding it as a golden opportunity to expel Saddam Hussein from the presidency, he invented stories about self-propelled biological weapons and secret factories.
					
					 He was shocked by U.S. State Secretary Colin L. Powell presenting at a UN session a picture of biological weapons drawn by him in March 2003. After a while, the Iraq war broke out when he was confined in a hotel.

articles.title: Russia, Cuba to Expand Cooperation
articles.content:
Russia, Cuba to Expand Cooperation
 Moscow, February 25 (KCNA) -- Russia and Cuba have agreed to expand cooperation in the fields of the economy and investment, particularly in energy and hydrocarbon development, transport infrastructure construction, pharmacy and bioengineering. 
					 The Russian Foreign Ministry said this on Monday in a briefing on the results of a meeting between the foreign ministers of the two countries in Moscow.
					
					 It also said they would continue joint activities to build an impartial and multipolar world order based on the principle of respect for equal international rights.
					
					 The Russian side reiterated its demand that the U.S. blockade against Cuba be lifted, it added.

articles.title: Poland to Revise Law on Nuclear Power Plant Construction
articles.content:
Poland to Revise Law on Nuclear Power Plant Construction  
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Polish government made public Tuesday an amended bill of the law on nuclear power plant construction.
					 The bill stipulates principles and detailed rules on preparations for the construction of nuclear power plant, its building project and operation. It also defines the supervision mission of the State Nuclear Development Security Committee.
					
					 It should be approved by parliament to take effect from July 1.
					
					 Poland plans to build its first nuclear power plant by 2020.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Politician of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Politician of Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The birthday of leader Kim Jong Il is not only the greatest national holiday of the Koreans but a great auspicious day of the world progressives.
					 Jean Baptiste Nkoy, general secretary of the People's Rally for Socialism of Democratic Congo, said this in a statement on Feb. 16, the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities Kim Jong Il indicates the path to be followed by the Korean people and the progressive mankind and is making tireless efforts for the people's happiness and national reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are striving to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve national reunification, holding him in high esteem as the centre of leadership and rallied as one in mind around him.

articles.title: Seminar Held in Russia to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Seminar Held in Russia to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar was held in Russia on Feb. 15 to mark the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, made a speech under the title of "Kim Jong Il and his prominent ideo-theoretical activities".
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il has developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the party organizing and guiding all victories of the Korean people through his extraordinary ideo-theoretical activities. 
					
					 Nikolayev, a member of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works, in his speech titled "Giving priority to ideology" said that the DPRK is now displaying its dignity as an invincible socialist country undeterred by the imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					 The credit for it goes to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has consistently given top priority to ideology, he added.
					
					 Dmitriyev Andrei, chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, in a speech titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia" stressed the significance of his Russia visit.

articles.title: Media of Various Countries Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Media of Various Countries Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
						
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- TV and radios of different countries broadcasted special reports and Korean films in celebration of February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On Feb. 16 TV of Equatorial Guinea reported that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the army and people of the DPRK and thus performed great feats in political, military, economic and all other fields.
					
					 On Feb. 15 a radio of this country said that the traditional friendly relations between Equatorial Guinea and the DPRK have invariably developed on good terms despite all sorts of challenges and they are now making great contribution to the common interests of the two peoples in the efforts to defend independence and sovereignty.
					
					 The central TV of Syria on Feb. 16 broadcasted a Korean film on Kim Jong Il's energetic external activities while its radio aired a special report celebrating his birthday. 
					
					 On the same day, TV of Nakhodka, Russia, broadcasted scenes on activities of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with melody of "Song of General Kim Jong Il" as background music.
					
					 Russia's 1TV and Vesti 24 TV of Khabarovsk Maritime Territory on Feb. 16 and 17 telecasted activities of Kim Jong Il with Korean song "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and events held in the DPRK to celebrate his birthday.
					
					 The central TV of Vietnam and the state-run TV of Finland reported on Feb. 15 and 16 about grand celebrations of Kim Jong Il's birthday in the DPRK with his photo.
					
					 An Ecuadorian TV broadcasted Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" on Feb. 12 and 13.
					
					 The C. Equis 36 Radio Centenario of Uruguay aired Korean song "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas" three times on Feb. 16.
					
					 That day the state radio of Uganda reported that the Korean people celebrate the birthday of Kim Jong Il as the greatest national holiday every year.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe Kim Jong Il's Birthday 
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried special write-ups to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Russia's newspaper Selskaya Zhyzn on Feb. 15 carried an article titled "Life for the People" with a photo of Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to a factory. 
					
					 The article cited facts to show his personality as a great man who makes ceaseless journey of great devotion for the country's prosperity and people's happiness, regarding his birthday as an ordinary workday.
					
					 The Feb. 14th issue of a Vietnamese newspaper carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il Revered by People" with photos of him inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and giving field guidance to different sectors of the national economy. 
					
					 The Feb. 15th issue of a Syrian paper ran articles under such titles as "Power of Independence", "Kim Jong Il and Policy of Trust" with photos of him.
					
					 The Lao paper Pasason on Feb. 16 edited an article titled "Kim Jong Il, Dear Son of the People" with a photo of him acknowledging the cheering crowd at the platform of Kim Il Sung Square. 
					
					 Other newspapers of this country also carried similar articles with his photos on February 15 and 16.
					
					 The Feb. 11th issue of the British paper The New Worker edited a photo of Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering soldiers with illustration.

articles.title: Meetings in Various Countries Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Meetings in Various Countries Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Pakistan, South Africa and Bulgaria between Feb. 11 and 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The deputy speaker of the Assembly of Sind State, Pakistan, and other speakers said that the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for prosperity and independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the noble cause of global peace and independence would remain long with history.
					
					 They expressed belief that under his wise leadership the Korean people would surely emerge victorious in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The international secretary of the of the African National Congress Youth League of South Africa said that thanks to the indefatigable leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity as a politico-ideological and military power and made unimaginable successes in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the great leader who is creditably accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, said the chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 A letter and a congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings in Pakistan and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Anecdote about Kim Il Sung's Field Guidance to Tideland Reclamation Site
articles.content:
Anecdote about Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- It happened one day in August of 1966 when President Kim Il Sung left on field guidance to a tideland reclamation site. 
					 But it rained, accompanied by strong wind from that morning. To crown it all, it was necessary to travel to the site by ship.
					
					 The officials accompanying the President told him to avoid going there by ship in such bad weather.
					
					 The President, however, boarded the ship, saying he should meet with the builders in the tideland reclamation site without fail. 
					
					 Upon arriving at the site, braving rough waves, he shook hands with its officials one by one and asked them about the progress made in the reclamation since its start. 
					
					 After hearing them, he exclaimed what a gigantic project they were undertaking and what a wonderful natural resource it would bring. He encouraged the builders, noting patriotism was displayed there.

articles.title: Simposio nacional de medicina Coryo
articles.content:
Simposio nacional de medicina Coryo 
　Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario de la fundacion de la Academia de Ciencia Medica Coryo, tuvo lugar del dia 23 al 25 en esta capital el simposio nacional sobre esa medicina tradicional bajo la participacion de los cientificos, maestros y funcionarios de la rama. 
					　En el foro fueron presentadas las disertaciones que exponen los exitos y experiencias logrados en la investigacion cientifica para asentar la medicina Coryo sobre la nueva base cientifico-tecnica, en el tratamiento y la profilaxis.
					
					　Centraron la atencion de los participantes las tesis que presentaron los eficientes metodos de acupuntura, que combinaron bien la medicina Coryo y la moderna y resolvieron los problemas surgidos en el tratamiento de enfermedades dificiles de curar, y las excelentes recetas tradicionales. 
					
					　En particular, fueron aplaudidas las monografias que explicaron cientificamente las experiencias y presentaron los exitos alcanzados en la investigacion sobre la produccion estandarizada de medicamentos Coryo y de sus extractos.

articles.title: Pyongyaneses rechazan versiones sobre el islote Tok
articles.content:
Pyongyaneses rechazan versiones sobre el islote Tok
　Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ATCC) -- Al reportar hace poco que los habitantes del departamento de Shimane cambian sus lugares de origen al islote Tok, los medios de prensa de Japon lo analizaron como una protesta al gobierno por no mostrarse activo en el "litigio territorial".
					　Informados de esas versiones, los ciudadanos de Pyongyang las rechazaron tajantemente reafirmando que el islote Tok es una intocable parte del territorio coreano.
					
					　Pak Chol Yong (de 35 anos de edad), obrero de la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang, declaro a la ATCC que las autoridades japonesas plantearon malintencionadamente el "problema del islote Tok" y acechan ahora la oportunidad para despojarlo.
					
					　Continuo que el reclamo de ellas de su "soberania" sobre ese islote parte de su ambicion de bandido de tomar todo el territorio coreano usando las fuerzas armadas.
					
					　Jo Hui Sung (de 59 anos de edad), director del Instituto de Historia de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, recordo que las autoridades japonesas demostraron abiertamente su ambicion de usurpar el islote Tok en su "carta azul diplomatica de 2010" y "carta blanca de defensa de 2010".
					
					　Prosiguio que el Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon publico oficialmente la "guia de estudio" sobre el nuevo manual de escuelas superiores anotandolo como lo japones.
					
					　Algunos japoneses cambian su lugar de origen al islote Tok. Pienso que esto forma parte de la astuta y obstinada campana de los reaccionarios japoneses para expandir su territorio, asevero.
					
					　Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia dandose cuenta de que es una ilusion nunca realizable su intento de agredir de nuevo a Corea, finalizo.

articles.title: Rusia y Cuba se esfuerzan por fortalecer la cooperacion
articles.content:
Rusia y Cuba se esfuerzan por fortalecer la cooperacion
　Moscu, 23 de febrero (ATCC) -- Rusia y Cuba acordaron ampliar la cooperacion en las ramas de economia e inversion, especialmente, en el desarrollo de energias e hidrocarburos, la construccion de infraestructuras de transporte, la farmaceutica y la biotecnologia.
					  Lo informo el dia 21 el MINREX de Rusia al publicar el resultado del encuentro entre los cancilleres de ambos paises en Moscu.
					
					  Subrayo ademas que quieren seguir actuando en conjunto para establecer un imparcial y multilateral orden mundial basado en el principio de igualdad y respeto a los derechos internacionales.
					
					  Prosiguio que la parte rusa ratifico su invariable posicion de que debe ser levantado el bloqueo anticubano de Estados Unidos.

articles.title: Exiliado iraqui reconoce la falsedad de pretexto de guerra iraqui
articles.content:
Exiliado iraqui reconoce la falsedad de pretexto de guerra iraqui 
　Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun Asahi Shimbun del dia 20, un exiliado iraqui reconocio por primera vez que para derrocar el regimen de Hussein, el habia manipulado la informacion sobre el sospechoso desarrollo de armas de destruccion masiva, pretexto utilizado por Estados Unidos para lanzar la guerra iraqui.
					  Ese hombre, exiliado a Alemania en marzo de 2000, recibio enseguida la oferta de colaboracion de parte de una autoridad del servicio de inteligencia exterior de ese pais.
					
					  Pensando en que "eso seria la magnifica oportunidad para expulsar al presidente Saddam Hussein", el invento la historia de camiones-laboratorios de armas biologicas y fabricas secretas.
					
					  Pero, recibio un impacto psicologico en marzo de 2003 cuando vio al entonces secretario de Estado de EE.UU., Colin L. Powell, presentar en la ONU el dibujo de las instalaciones de armas biologicas falsificadas.
					
					  Poco despues comenzo la guerra iraqui cuando el estuvo encerrado en un hotel.
